title: Florida Citrus Sports' Hogan: Pro Bowl Coming to Orlando(Audio)
itunes:title: Florida Citrus Sports' Hogan: Pro Bowl Coming to Orlando(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Florida Citrus Sports’ CEO Steve Hogan discusses how he snagged the Pro Bowl to come to Orlando, and other sports entertainment growth in Central Florida. Broadcasting LIVE at Pershing's INSITE 2016 conference in Orlando.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
